permafrost.tundra.tn.document

Class BizDocEnvelopeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.document.BizDocEnvelopeHelper

  • public final class BizDocEnvelopeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Trading Networks BizDocEnvelope objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope get(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the BizDocEnvelope associated with the given ID without its associated content parts.
      static com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope get(java.lang.String id, boolean includeContent)
      Returns the BizDocEnvelope, and optionally its content parts, associated with the given ID.
      static boolean hasErrors(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope document)
      Returns true if the given BizDocEnvelope has any errors.
      static boolean hasErrors(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope document, java.lang.String messageClass)
      Returns true if the given BizDocEnvelope has any errors of the given message class.
      static boolean hasUnrecoverableErrors(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope document)
      Returns true if the given BizDocEnvelope has any unrecoverable errors.
      static boolean isDuplicate(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope document)
      Returns true if the given document is a duplicate of another existing document, where duplicates are defined as having the same document type, sender, receiver, and document ID.
      static void log(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc, java.lang.String messageType, java.lang.String messageClass, java.lang.String messageSummary, java.lang.String messageDetails)
      Adds an activity log statement to the given BizDocEnvelope.

      Adds an activity log statement to the given BizDocEnvelope.
      static com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope normalize(com.wm.data.IData input)
      Returns a full BizDocEnvelope, if given either a subset or full BizDocEnvelope as an IData document.
      static com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope normalize(com.wm.data.IData input, boolean includeContent)
      Returns a full BizDocEnvelope, if given either a subset or full BizDocEnvelope as an IData document.

      Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope.

      Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope.

      Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope with optimistic concurrency supported by ensuring the status is only updated if it equals the given previous value.

    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        public static com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope normalize(com.wm.data.IData input)
                                                  throws com.wm.app.tn.db.DatastoreException
        Returns a full BizDocEnvelope, if given either a subset or full BizDocEnvelope as an IData document.
        Parameters:
        input - An IData document which could be a BizDocEnvelope, or could be a subset of a BizDocEnvelope that includes an InternalID key.
        Returns:
        The full BizDocEnvelope associated with the given IData document.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.tn.db.DatastoreException - If a database error occurs.

      • normalize

        public static com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope normalize(com.wm.data.IData input,
                                                         boolean includeContent)
                                                  throws com.wm.app.tn.db.DatastoreException
        Returns a full BizDocEnvelope, if given either a subset or full BizDocEnvelope as an IData document.
        Parameters:
        input - An IData document which could be a BizDocEnvelope, or could be a subset of a BizDocEnvelope that includes an InternalID key.
        includeContent - Whether to include all content parts with the returned BizDocEnvelope.
        Returns:
        The full BizDocEnvelope associated with the given IData document.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.tn.db.DatastoreException - If a database error occurs.

      • isDuplicate

        public static boolean isDuplicate(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope document)
                           throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given document is a duplicate of another existing document, where duplicates are defined as having the same document type, sender, receiver, and document ID.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to check whether it is a duplicate.
        Returns:
        True if this document is a duplicate.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error occurs.

                             java.lang.String systemStatus,
                             java.lang.String userStatus)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope.
        Parameters:
        bizdoc - The BizDocEnvelope to update the status on.
        systemStatus - The system status to be set.
        userStatus - The user status to be set.
        Throws:

      • setStatus

        public static void setStatus(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc,
                             java.lang.String systemStatus,
                             java.lang.String userStatus,
                             boolean silence)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope.
        Parameters:
        bizdoc - The BizDocEnvelope to update the status on.
        systemStatus - The system status to be set. If null, system status will not be set.
        userStatus - The user status to be set.
        silence - If true, the status is not changed.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error is encountered.

      • setStatus

        public static boolean setStatus(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc,
                                java.lang.String systemStatus,
                                java.lang.String previousSystemStatus,
                                java.lang.String userStatus,
                                java.lang.String previousUserStatus,
                                boolean silence)
                         throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope with optimistic concurrency supported by ensuring the status is only updated if it equals the given previous value.
        Parameters:
        bizdoc - The BizDocEnvelope to update the status on.
        systemStatus - The system status to be set. If null, system status will not be set.
        previousSystemStatus - The previous value of the system status.
        userStatus - The user status to be set. If null, user status will not be set.
        previousUserStatus - The previous value of the user status.
        silence - If true, the status is not changed.
        Returns:
        True if the status was updated.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error is encountered.

      • setStatus

        public static boolean setStatus(java.lang.String internalID,
                                java.lang.String systemStatus,
                                java.lang.String previousSystemStatus,
                                java.lang.String userStatus,
                                java.lang.String previousUserStatus,
                                boolean silence)
                         throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Updates the status on the given BizDocEnvelope with optimistic concurrency supported by ensuring the status is only updated if it equals the given previous value.
        Parameters:
        internalID - The internal ID of the bizdoc to update the status on.
        systemStatus - The system status to be set. If null, system status will not be set.
        previousSystemStatus - The previous value of the system status.
        userStatus - The user status to be set. If null, user status will not be set.
        previousUserStatus - The previous value of the user status.
        silence - If true, the status is not changed.
        Returns:
        True if the status was updated.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a database error is encountered.

      • log

        public static void log(com.wm.app.tn.doc.BizDocEnvelope bizdoc,
                       java.lang.String messageType,
                       java.lang.String messageClass,
                       java.lang.String messageSummary,
                       java.lang.String messageDetails)
                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Adds an activity log statement to the given BizDocEnvelope. TODO: convert this to a pure java service, rather than an invoke of a flow service.
        Parameters:
        bizdoc - The BizDocEnvelope to add the activity log statement to.
        messageType - The type of message to be logged.
        messageClass - The class of the message to be logged.
        messageSummary - The summary of the message to be logged.
        messageDetails - The detail of the message to be logged.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs while logging.

        messageType - The type of message to be logged.

        messageSummary - The summary of the message to be logged.
        messageDetails - The detail of the message to be logged.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs while logging.
